abhiyachanadhikaranaya aandukrama wyawasthawa anuwa 66 (u) waganthiya anuwa “yam kisi thanaththeku manthri warayeku washayen thora pathkara ganima thathkalaye balapawathna nithiya yatathe nishprabha karanu labimen” ya yana padanama matha pihita katayuthu kale nam, 2015 juli 13 wenida swadhina mathiwarana komisamame galla sahakara mathiwarana komasaris wetha eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya lekam wisin sawadya diwurum prakashana sahithawa galla disthrikaya sandaha idiripath kala apekshakayin 13 denekugen samanwitha sampurna layisthuwama awalangu wanu atha.

ee sambandhayen ma prashna kala wita polis bhata kandayamak madhyama rathriye apa niwasata pana je aar 1984 di pamana athi kala, di es senanayaka widuhala asala pihiti jathika buddhi wimarshana mandalayata ma gena giya.

indiyawa salakilimathwana karunu pahatha sandahan ayuru nirakaranaya karalimata apage sakachchawaladi eya aramunu kota gena oba ekanga wiya.(a) wideshiya hamuda piris saha rahas thorathuru karya mandala sitima indu - lanka sabandathawalata ahithakara nowana baw sahathika kirima sandaha owunge uchithabhawaya saha owun upayogi kara ganima pilibandawa obathuma saha ma athara ikmanin ekangathwayak athikaraganu atha.(aa) indiyawehi yahapathata ahithakara wana andamata thirakunamalaya ho shri lankawehi an kisi warayak kisidu rataka yuda katayuthuwala prayojanaya sandaha laba nodenu atha.(a) thirakunamalayehi athi thel tanki samuhaya prathisanskaranaya kota prayojanayata ganima indiyawa saha shri lankawa atharawu hawul wyaparayek washayen kirayathmaka karanu atha.(aa) wideshiya guwanwiduli pracharaka sanwidhanayan wisin shri lankawehi pihituwanu labana wiwidha pahasukam prasiddha guwan widuli pracharayan sandaha wu pahasukam wina yuda katayuthu ho rahas thorathuru ras kirima sandaha wu ho eewa nowana bawata sahathika kirima sandaha eki sanwidhana samanga athi kara gena athi giwisum samalochanaya karanu atha.3.
